sql-script.name: organization
sql-script.tran-sql: create table sf_organization_account ( id char(32) not null, name varchar2(32 char) not null, password varchar2(32 char) default '' not null, status number(4) not null, accountmark number(4) not null, createdate timestamp not null, login number(1) not null, lastlogindate timestamp, lastloginip varchar2(24 char), logintimes number(11) not null, onlinemillis number(20) not null, mailbinding number(1) not null, mobilebinding number(1) not null, longitude number(20, 14) not null, latitude number(20, 14) not null, openid varchar2(64 char), unique(name), primary key(id) );

create table sf_organization_user ( id char(32) not null, departmentid char(32), text varchar2(32 char) not null, sex varchar2(2 char), birthday date, hometown varchar2(32 char), email varchar2(32 char), homephone varchar2(16 char), officephone varchar2(16 char), mobile varchar2(16 char), address varchar2(256 char), postcode varchar2(8 char), qq varchar2(16 char), msn varchar2(16 char), description varchar2(256 char), oorder number(11) not null, primary key(id), unique (oorder) );

create table sf_organization_department ( id char(32) not null, parentid char(32), name varchar2(32 char) not null, text varchar2(32 char) not null, departmenttype number(4) not null, description varchar2(256 char), oorder number(11) not null, primary key(id), unique(name), unique(parentid, text), unique (oorder) );

create table sf_organization_role ( id char(32) not null, parentid char(32), rolechartid char(32) not null, name varchar2(64 char) not null, text varchar2(32 char) not null, roletype number(4) not null, rolemark number(4) not null, userrole number(1) not null, rulehandler varchar2(128 char), rulescript clob, description varchar2(256 char), oorder number(11) not null, primary key(id), unique(rolechartid, name), unique (oorder) );

create table sf_organization_rolechart ( id char(32) not null, departmentid char(32), name varchar2(32 char) not null, text varchar2(32 char) not null, chartmark number(4) not null, description varchar2(256 char), oorder number(11) not null, primary key(id), unique (name), unique (departmentid, text), unique (oorder) );

create table sf_organization_rolemember ( id char(32) not null, roleid char(32) not null, membertype number(4) not null, memberid char(32) not null, primaryrole number(1) not null, description varchar2(256 char), oorder number(11) not null, primary key(id), unique (roleid, membertype, memberid), unique (oorder) );

create table sf_organization_roleresource ( id char(32) not null, roleid char(32) not null, resourcetype number(4) not null, resourceid char(32) not null, resourcetext varchar2(64 char), description varchar2(256 char), primary key(id), unique (roleid, resourcetype, resourceid) );
